pullrequest.title: undo redo added to edit menu and re arranged it

content.raw:
I believe we should leave the menu options in their current location. 

My suggestion stems only from what I expect as menu options, and I may not be the best source of info. Take a look at your web browser. Access to "downloads" is 'File->Downloads`, or something similar. Sketchup and Solidworks also tend to use single word descriptors for menu items.
content.html:
I believe we should leave the menu options in their current location.

My suggestion stems only from what I expect as menu options, and I may not be the best source of info. Take a look at your web browser. Access to "downloads" is 'File->Downloads`, or something similar. Sketchup and Solidworks also tend to use single word descriptors for menu items.
